summary: In 1998, thirty-four unidentified bodies were found in shallow graves in a remote Siberian forest. After investigations, no official explanation by the authorities was ever offered. But the forest was only the beginning.
cast: Dervla Kirwan|Charlotte Riley|Branko Tomovic|Rupert Hill|Oliver Jackson|Michael David Worden|Stephanie Johanan|Claire Leatherbarrow|Anna Lewis|Adam Peter Marsden|Leanne Rowley|Warwick St. John
title: Entity
